name: checkrooms
description: Check if a set of rooms are free during a given period.

options.name: rooms
options.description: The room codes to query, separated by whitespace and case-insensitive.

options.name: times
options.description: The hours to query in 24-hour time, separated by whitespace (like '8 12'). Defaults to current hour.

name: labfree
description: Check if the labs in the McNulty building are free during an hour-long period.

options.name: times
options.description: The hours to query in 24-hour time, separated by whitespace (like '8 12'). Defaults to current hour.

name: timetable
description: Find a timetable for a course and day

options.name: course
options.description: The code for the course you want to query. Case insensitive.

options.name: day
options.description: The day of this week to check for. Defaults to today.

name: ping
description: Check if the bot is currently alive.
